message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CC

This paper deals with the task of automatic classification of patent applications using computational methods. The methods used involve natural language processing techniques such as feature extraction and machine learning algorithms such as SVM ensembles. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval) which deals with the retrieval of information from unstructured data such as text. Other likely sub-categories include cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing, cs.LG (Machine Learning) which deals with the development of algorithms for learning from data, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) which deals with the development of intelligent agents, and cs.CC (Computational Complexity) which deals with the analysis of algorithms and their complexity.
